title: 2017 Texas Renaissance Festival
address: 21778 FM 1774 Todd Mission, TX 77363 United States
body: The Texas Renaissance Festival, the nation’s largest, most acclaimed renaissance theme park, returns for the 43rd season with the addition of a ninth weekend. The magic of the Festival transports patrons to the 16th century offering enchanting experiences featuring world-renowned live entertainment, works by master artists and craftspeople, award winning food and drink, hand-powered rides and games, and over 100 interactive characters.

title: Pearland Arts & Crafts on the Pavilion at Pearland Town Center
address: 11200 Broadway St Pearland, TX 77584 United States
body: Experience a 2-day juried art show that will feature a variety of fine art and unique works for sale at the Pearland Arts & Crafts on the Pavilion. Spend the day outdoors strolling through the aisle filled with art while enjoying a food trucks court, sipping wine at their wine bistro, taking the little ones to the kids’ interactive station, and watching live performances. Admission: Free.

title: 6th Annual King’s Oktoberfest Weekend at King’s Biergarten in Pearland
address: 1329 E Broadway Street Pearland, TX 77581 United States
body: King’s annual Oktoberfest celebration returns with more live German music, more biers, more brats, and more fun. Admission starts at $12.

title: EaDo Vintage Fest: One Year Anniversary Party
address: 4009 Polk St C, Houston , TX 77023 United States
body: Shop for vintage clothing, locally made products, artisans, food and more while vibing to DJs and live music at the EaDo Vintage Fest. Admission No cover.

title: Roots Reggae Houston Music Festival at Hobby Event Center
address: 9906 Gulf Freeway Houston , TX 77034 United States
body: Experience positive vibes, arts and crafts vendors, food and lots of reggae music at the Roots Reggae Houston Festival at the Hobby Event Center. Admission Tickets are $10.

title: Woodlands BBQ Festival at Town Green Park
address: 2099 Lake Robbins Dr. The Woodlands, TX 77380 United States
body: The 2nd Annual Woodlands BBQ Festival will feature celebrated BBQ pitmasters from the Houston area. Enjoy an afternoon filled with the finest BBQ around, activities for the kids, live music, cold beer and the chance to bring awareness to Pulmonary Hypertension Association. Admission Tickets are $37.50; $75 for VIP.

title: Houston Astros: Postseason Watch Parties at Minute Maid Park
address: 501 Crawford St Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: For all the games in Boston and throughout the postseason, you’ll be able to join with up to 40,000 fans at the place the ‘Stros call home. Minute Maid Park will be hosting fans with the game on the big screen, live music, food trucks, and plenty to do for kids (face painting, inflatables, and games highlight the festivities). Free to attend, but attendees need to claim a free voucher in order to get in.

title: Miami Vice Sunday Funday at Henke & Pillot Houston
address: 809 Congress Avenue Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Spend your Sunday Funday having drinks and brunch as DJ Johnny Mac spins Miami style beats at Henke & Pillot Houston. Admission No cover.

title: Poetry Special: The Secret’s Out at The Secret Group
address: 2101 Polk Street Houston, TX 77003 United States
body: Hear poetry performances from 7 local poets and jam out to music from DJs at The Secret Group. Admission Tickets are $5 in advance and $10 at the door.

title: The Black Angels in Concert at House of Blues
address: 1204 Caroline St. Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Austin-based psychedelic rock band, The Black Angels perform at House of Blues with openers Car Seat Headrest. Admission  Tickets start at $25.

title: James Vincent McMorrow at The Heights Theater
address: 339 W 19th St Houston, TX 70008 United States
body: Irish artist and musician James Vincent McMorrow hits the stage to perform songs off of his new record We Move at The Heights Theater. Admission Tickets are $20.

title: Houston Texans vs. Kansas City Chiefs at NRG Stadium
address: Reliant Pkwy Houston, TX 77054 United States
body: Cheer loud for the Texans as they battle it out against the Kansas City Chiefs at NRG Stadium. Admission Tickets range from $50 to $400.

title: Comic Chris Tucker at Smart Financial Centre
address: 18111 Lexington Boulevard Sugar Land, TX 77479 United States
body: Bust a gut laughing when comedian and actor Chris Tucker makes his way to the Smart Financial Centre at Sugar Land. The show was rescheduled from Wednesday, September 9, 2017 following Hurricane Harvey. Admission Tickets start at $45.50.

title: Songwriter Sundays at Dean’s Downtown
address: 316 Main St Houston, TX United States
body: Spend your Sunday relaxing and listening to music by local singer songwriters at Dean's Downtown.
